nodes.text: Taozin amulets, also called Taozin skin nodules, were amulets made out of the skin of Taozin. They blurred and clouded Force senses so their wearers could not be detected easily by a Force-sensitive. Lorn Pavan used a nodule for a sneak attack against the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Maul in 32 BBY, who still could not perceive Pavan's presence even after seeing him.
These amulets were also used by Inquisitors on Imperial Center around 18 BBY.
